macroScript.title: Macro script that is activated by 'run' call that can add log entries for GET /v1/macro/log. arguments, callProc(), addLog(), resolve(), reject(), print() are customized methods/values

pollScript.title: Periodically run script that can add log entries for GET /v1/macro/log. callProc(), addLog(), print() are customized methods

pollInterval.title: Script polling interval in MINUTES. Aligned with the start of hour. Eg. 30 means checking on :0,:30 every hour. 20 means :0,:20,:40. 45 means :0 and :45.
